comments:
F1 build.
After starting help search and clicking cancel during indexing, the log gets 
filled with the OperationCanceledException.  This exception should be handled 
internally and not be logged.

!SESSION May 23, 2002 18:54:06.836 ---------------------------------------------
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.3.1 IBM Windows 32 build cn131-20020403 (JIT enabled: 
jitc)
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US

org.eclipse.platform -install file:D:/eclipse 0521test/

!MESSAGE Reference action not found: additions

!MESSAGE Exception occured executing help search
!STACK 0
